Interrupts.Name: Intervention
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally in range 3 is targeted by an ability.
Interrupts.Effects: The ally gains resistance against that ability. The monk may then teleport adjacent to that ally.

Actions.Name: Punishment
Actions.Effects: Becomes a critical hit (+[D]) against pacified foes.

Actions.Name: Pressure Point
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 is branded. If already branded, they are pacified.
